name: Odin
description: ODIN is a community project created in the Bitcoin ecosystem. It is the first and only Lord memecoin of Bitcoin and has adopted the culture as the lord of all memecoins. The ODIN community develops DeFi projects on Bitcoin; 1) ODIN owns DEX ( Viking Swap); We have built Viking Swap, the first aggregator DEX on Bitcoin. 2) ODIN is building bitcoin layer 2; We are building a layer 2 that has no precedent in the bitcoin ecosystem. Our product will appeal to many blockchains and increase ODIN's popularity.
